example_1: yato kho, gahapati, ariyasāvakassa pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti, catūhi ca sotāpatti'y'aṅgehi samannāgato hoti
example_2: aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhaddo ass'ājānīyo rāj'āraho hoti rājabhoggo, rañño aṅgan't'eva saṅkhaṃ gacchati. katamehi aṭṭhahi?
example_3: saddho ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti, no ca sīlavā. evaṃ so ten'aṅgena aparipūro hoti. tena taṃ aṅgaṃ paripūretabbaṃ, kin't'āhaṃ saddho ca assaṃ, sīlavā cā'ti!
example_4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti, no dubbhāsitā, anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūnan'ti.

example_1: karaṇīyam'atthakusalena, yaṃ taṃ santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca, sakko ujū ca suhujū ca, suvaco c'assa mudu, anatimānī.
example_2: kālena ca bhāsitā hoti, saccā ca bhāsitā hoti, saṇhā ca bhāsitā hoti, atthasaṃhitā ca bhāsitā hoti, mettacittena ca bhāsitā hoti.

example_1: kālavādī bhūtavādī atthavādī dhammavādī vinayavādī nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā kālena sāpadesaṃ pariyantavatiṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ
example_2: yañ'ca kho jaññā rahovādaṃ bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ tatra kālaññū assa tassa rahovādassa vacanāya.
example_3: kālena ca bhāsitā hoti, saccā ca bhāsitā hoti, saṇhā ca bhāsitā hoti, atthasaṃhitā ca bhāsitā hoti, mettacittena ca bhāsitā hoti.

meaning: existence; idea of existence; fact of being present
example_1: tattha purimesu catūsu kiccesu padīpakiccaṃ idāni suriy'ālokassa atthitāya n'atthi, aparāni tīṇi bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ jānantehi bhikkhūhi katāni pariniṭṭhitāni honti.
example_2: dvayanissito khv'āyaṃ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena, atthitañ'c'eva natthitañ'ca. lokasamudayaṃ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato yā loke natthitā sā na hoti. lokanirodhaṃ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato yā loke atthitā sā na hoti.

example_1: bhikkhu yathā iṇaṃ yathā rogaṃ yathā bandhan'āgāraṃ yathā dāsabyaṃ yathā kantāra-addhānamaggaṃ
example_2: tatth'āyaṃ samayo, gilānasamayo, cīvaradānasamayo, cīvarakārasamayo, addhānagamanasamayo, nāv'ābhiruhanasamayo, mahāsamayo, samaṇabhattasamayo, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
example_3: addhānakkhamo hoti, padhānakkhamo hoti, app'ābādho hoti, asitaṃ pītaṃ khāyitaṃ sāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati, caṅkam'ādhigato samādhi ciraṭṭhitiko hoti.

example_1: addhānakkhamo hoti, padhānakkhamo hoti, app'ābādho hoti, asitaṃ pītaṃ khāyitaṃ sāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati, caṅkam'ādhigato samādhi ciraṭṭhitiko hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca caṅkame ānisaṃsā'ti.

so suṇāti tathāgatassa vā tathāgatasāvakassa vā sabbesaṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhāna-adhiṭṭhāna-pariyuṭṭhāna-abhinivesa-anusayānaṃ samugghātāya sabbasaṅkhārasamathāya sabb'ūpadhipaṭinissaggāya taṇhākkhayāya virāgāya nirodhāya nibbānāya dhammaṃ desentassa.
example_2: upay'upādān'ābhinivesavinibandho khv'āyaṃ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena. tañ'c'āyaṃ upay'upādānaṃ cetaso adhiṭṭhānaṃ abhinives'ānusayaṃ na upeti na upādiyati n'ādhiṭṭhāti, attā me'ti.

example_1: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti, no dubbhāsitā, anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūnan'ti.
example_2: dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito viyatto sappuriso akkhataṃ anupahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ bahuñ'ca puññaṃ pasavati.

example_1: dānañ'ca dhammacariyā ca, ñātakānañ'ca saṅgaho. anavajjāni kammāni, etam'maṅgalam'uttamaṃ.
example_2: sīlabbataṃ vā'pi pahāya sabbaṃ, kammañ'ca sāvajj'anavajjam'etaṃ, suddhiṃ asuddhin'ti apatthayāno, virato care santim'anuggahāya.
example_3: so iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato ajjhattaṃ anavajjasukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti
example_4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti, no dubbhāsitā, anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūnan'ti.

example_1: ete te, bhikkhave, ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā, cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
example_2: diṭṭhiñ'ca anupagamma, sīlavā dassanena sampanno, kāmesu vineyya gedhaṃ, na hi jātuggabbhaseyya punar'etī'ti.
example_3: sabbaṃ atthī'ti kho, kaccāna, ayam'eko anto. sabbaṃ n'atthī'ti ayaṃ dutiyo anto. ete te, kaccāna, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṃ deseti

example_1: dve'me, bhikkhave, antā pabbajitena na sevitabbā.
example_2: evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhu there bhikkhū etadavoca, phasso kho, āvuso, eko anto, phassasamudayo dutiyo anto, phassanirodho majjhe, taṇhā sibbinī.
example_3: ubhosu antesu vineyya chandaṃ, phassaṃ pariññāya anānugiddho, yadattagarahī tadakubbamāno, na lippatī diṭṭhasutesu dhīro.
example_4: idha vassaṃ vasissāmi, idha hem'antagimhisu, iti bālo vicinteti, antarāyaṃ na bujjhati.

meaning: independent of others; not relying on another
example_1: dukkham'eva uppajjamānaṃ uppajjati, dukkhaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ nirujjhatī'ti na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati aparapaccayā
paṇītaṃ yadi vā lūkhaṃ, appaṃ vā yadi vā bahuṃ. yāpanatthaṃ abhuñjiṃsu, agiddhā n'ādhimucchitā.
example_2: appam'pi ce sahitaṃ bhāsamāno, dhammassa hoti anudhammacārī, rāgañ'ca dosañ'ca pahāya mohaṃ, sammappajāno suvimuttacitto, anupādiyāno idha vā huraṃ vā, sa bhāgavā sāmaññassa hoti.

example_1: addhānakkhamo hoti, padhānakkhamo hoti, app'ābādho hoti, asitaṃ pītaṃ khāyitaṃ sāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati, caṅkam'ādhigato samādhi ciraṭṭhitiko hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca caṅkame ānisaṃsā'ti.
example_2: ehi tvaṃ, māṇavaka, yena samaṇo gotamo ten'upasaṅkama, upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ app'ābādhaṃ app'ātaṅkaṃ lah'uṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ puccha

example_1: upay'upādān'ābhinivesavinibandho khv'āyaṃ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena. tañ'c'āyaṃ upay'upādānaṃ cetaso adhiṭṭhānaṃ abhinives'ānusayaṃ na upeti na upādiyati n'ādhiṭṭhāti, attā me'ti.

meaning: engaging and grasping; approaching and clinging; going near and grabbing hold
example_1: upay'upādān'ābhinivesavinibandho khv'āyaṃ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena. tañ'c'āyaṃ upay'upādānaṃ cetaso adhiṭṭhānaṃ abhinives'ānusayaṃ na upeti na upādiyati n'ādhiṭṭhāti, attā me'ti.
example_2: kathañ'ca, gahapati, anokasārī hoti? rūpadhātuyā kho, gahapati, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upay'upādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhān'ābhinives'ānusayā te tathāgatassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā

meaning: attached to engaging, grasping and clinging; shackled to going near, grabbing and holding
example_1: upay'upādān'ābhinivesavinibandho khv'āyaṃ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena. tañ'c'āyaṃ upay'upādānaṃ cetaso adhiṭṭhānaṃ abhinives'ānusayaṃ na upeti na upādiyati n'ādhiṭṭhāti, attā me'ti.
vadanti ve duṭṭhamanā'pi eke, atho'pi ve saccamanā vadanti, vādañ'ca jātaṃ muni no upeti, tasmā munī n'atthi khilo kuhiñci.
example_2: upayo hi dhammesu upeti vādaṃ, anūpayaṃ kena kathaṃ vadeyya, attā nirattā na hi tassa atthi, adhosi so diṭṭhim'idh'eva sabban'ti.
example_3: upay'upādān'ābhinivesavinibandho khv'āyaṃ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena. tañ'c'āyaṃ upay'upādānaṃ cetaso adhiṭṭhānaṃ abhinives'ānusayaṃ na upeti na upādiyati n'ādhiṭṭhāti, attā me'ti.
example_4: so rūpaṃ upeti upādiyati adhiṭṭhāti attā me'ti.

example_1: sā kho pan'esā, bhikkhave, taṇhā kattha uppajjamānā uppajjati, kattha nivisamānā nivisati
example_2: dukkham'eva uppajjamānaṃ uppajjati, dukkhaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ nirujjhatī'ti na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati aparapaccayā ñāṇam'ev'assa ettha hoti. ettāvatā kho, kaccāna, sammādiṭṭhi hoti.

example_1: ete te, bhikkhave, ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati
example_2: mam'eva kata maññantu, gihīpabbajitā ubho, mam'ev'ātivasā assu, kicc'ākiccesu kismici. iti bālassa saṅkappo, icchā māno ca vaḍḍhati.
example_3: tassa te nāga nāgassa, mahāvīrassa bhāsato, sabbe dev'ānumodanti, ubho nāradapabbatā.
example_4: sabbaṃ atthī'ti kho, kaccāna, ayam'eko anto. sabbaṃ n'atthī'ti ayaṃ dutiyo anto. ete te, kaccāna, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṃ deseti

meaning: to this extent; to such a degree; so far
example_1: ettāvatā ca amhehi sambhataṃ puññasampadaṃ sabbe devā anumodantu sabbasampattisiddhiyā.
example_2: ettāvatā kho, āvuso, bhikkhu abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānāti, pariññeyyaṃ parijānāti, abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānanto pariññeyyaṃ parijānanto diṭṭh'eva dhamme dukkhass'antakaro hotī'ti.
example_3: ettāvatā'pi kho, āvuso, ariyasāvako sammādiṭṭhi hoti
example_4: dukkham'eva uppajjamānaṃ uppajjati, dukkhaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ nirujjhatī'ti na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati aparapaccayā ñāṇam'ev'assa ettha hoti. ettāvatā kho, kaccāna, sammādiṭṭhi hoti.

example_1: yo so, sāriputta, ariyasāvako tathāgate ek'antagato abhippasanno, na so tathāgate vā tathāgatasāsane vā kaṅkheyya vā vicikiccheyya vā'ti?
example_2: dukkham'eva uppajjamānaṃ uppajjati, dukkhaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ nirujjhatī'ti na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati aparapaccayā ñāṇam'ev'assa ettha hoti. ettāvatā kho, kaccāna, sammādiṭṭhi hoti.

example_1: ayam'pi kho pakudho kaccāno saṅghī c'eva gaṇī ca gaṇ'ācariyo ca ñāto yasassī titthakaro sādhusammato bahujanassa.
example_2: dvayanissito khv'āyaṃ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena, atthitañ'c'eva natthitañ'ca.
example_3: addasā kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ mahākaccānaṃ avidūre nisinnaṃ pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya kāyagatāya satiyā ajjhattaṃ parimukhaṃ sūpaṭṭhitāya.

meaning: in what way?; to what extent?; in what respect?
example_1: na hi pana taṃ, gahapati, paṭibhāsi bhagavantaṃ uttariṃ paṭipucchituṃ, kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, āturakāyo c'eva hoti āturacitto ca, kittāvatā ca pana āturakāyo hi kho hoti no ca āturacitto'ti?
example_2: sammādiṭṭhi sammādiṭṭhī'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sammādiṭṭhi hotī'ti?

example_1: addhānakkhamo hoti, padhānakkhamo hoti, app'ābādho hoti, asitaṃ pītaṃ khāyitaṃ sāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati, caṅkam'ādhigato samādhi ciraṭṭhitiko hoti.
example_2: puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu app'ābādho hoti app'ātaṅko, samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā samannāgato n'ātisītāya n'āccuṇhāya majjhimāya padhānakkhamāya. ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyo samayo padhānāya.

example_1: naṭṭhacīvaro nāma bhikkhussa cīvaraṃ agginā vā daḍḍhaṃ hoti, udakena vā vuḷhaṃ hoti, undūrehi vā upacikāhi vā khāyitaṃ hoti, paribhogajiṇṇaṃ vā hoti.
example_2: addhānakkhamo hoti, padhānakkhamo hoti, app'ābādho hoti, asitaṃ pītaṃ khāyitaṃ sāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati, caṅkam'ādhigato samādhi ciraṭṭhitiko hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca caṅkame ānisaṃsā'ti.

example_2: dvayanissito khv'āyaṃ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena, atthitañ'c'eva natthitañ'ca.

meaning: walking meditation; walking up and down (in meditation)
example_1: divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhehi
example_2: so eko gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati eko paṭikkamati eko raho nisīdati eko caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhāti.
example_3: addhānakkhamo hoti, padhānakkhamo hoti, app'ābādho hoti, asitaṃ pītaṃ khāyitaṃ sāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati, caṅkam'ādhigato samādhi ciraṭṭhitiko hoti.
example_4: moggallāna, pacchāpuresaññī caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhaheyyāsi antogatehi indriyehi a'bahigatena mānasena

meaning: achieved by walking meditation; acquired on the walking path
example_1: addhānakkhamo hoti, padhānakkhamo hoti, app'ābādho hoti, asitaṃ pītaṃ khāyitaṃ sāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati, caṅkam'ādhigato samādhi ciraṭṭhitiko hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca caṅkame ānisaṃsā'ti.
yatha'y'idaṃ brahmacariyaṃ addhaniyaṃ assa ciraṭṭhitikaṃ, tadassa bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lok'ānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ
example_2: seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, pāsāṇe lekhā na khippaṃ lujjati vātena vā udakena vā, ciraṭṭhitikā hoti, evam'evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, idh'ekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṃ kujjhati. so ca khv'assa kodho dīgharattaṃ anuseti.
example_3: addhānakkhamo hoti, padhānakkhamo hoti, app'ābādho hoti, asitaṃ pītaṃ khāyitaṃ sāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati, caṅkam'ādhigato samādhi ciraṭṭhitiko hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca caṅkame ānisaṃsā'ti.
example_4: ye'pi te, bhikkhave, devā dīgh'āyukā vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulā uccesu vimānesu ciraṭṭhitikā te'pi tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena bhayaṃ saṃvegaṃ santāsaṃ āpajjanti

example_1: vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
example_2: samaṇo, āvuso, gotamo sāvakānaṃ evaṃ dhammaṃ deseti, etha tumhe, bhikkhave, pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe satta bojjh'aṅge yathābhūtaṃ bhāvethā'ti.
example_3: kāmacchando, bhikkhave, āvaraṇo nīvaraṇo cetaso ajjhāruho paññāya dubbalīkaraṇo. byāpādo, bhikkhave, āvaraṇo nīvaraṇo cetaso ajjhāruho paññāya dubbalīkaraṇo.
example_4: tañ'c'āyaṃ upay'upādānaṃ cetaso adhiṭṭhānaṃ abhinives'ānusayaṃ na upeti na upādiyati n'ādhiṭṭhāti, attā me'ti.

example_1: upay'upādān'ābhinivesavinibandho khv'āyaṃ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena. tañ'c'āyaṃ upay'upādānaṃ cetaso adhiṭṭhānaṃ abhinives'ānusayaṃ na upeti na upādiyati n'ādhiṭṭhāti, attā me'ti.
saccaṃ bhaṇe na kujjheyya, dajjā appam'pi yācito, etehi tīhi ṭhānehi, gacche devāna santike.
example_2: idha, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhiṃ saṃvoharamāno evaṃ jānāti, aññathā kho ayam'āyasmā ekena eko voharati, aññathā dvīhi, aññathā tīhi, aññathā sambahulehi
example_3: tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo. katamehi tīhi?

example_1: pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti, no dubbhāsitā, anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūnaṃ. katamehi pañcahi?
example_2: davakamyatā hīnena hīnaṃ vadeti, caṇḍālaṃ venaṃ nesādaṃ rathakāraṃ pukkusaṃ, caṇḍālosi, venosi, nesādosi, rathakārosi, pukkusosī'ti bhaṇati, āpatti vācāya, vācāya dubbhāsitassa.

example_1: n'ābhāsamānaṃ jānanti, missaṃ bālehi paṇḍitaṃ, bhāsamānañ'ca jānanti, desentaṃ amataṃ padaṃ.
example_2: so suṇāti tathāgatassa vā tathāgatasāvakassa vā sabbesaṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhāna-adhiṭṭhāna-pariyuṭṭhāna-abhinivesa-anusayānaṃ samugghātāya sabbasaṅkhārasamathāya sabb'ūpadhipaṭinissaggāya taṇhākkhayāya virāgāya nirodhāya nibbānāya dhammaṃ desentassa.
example_3: accayaṃ accayato na passati, accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ nappaṭikaroti, parassa kho pana accayaṃ desentassa yathādhammaṃ nappaṭiggaṇhāti.

meaning: dependent on a duality; attached to two things
example_1: dvayanissito khv'āyaṃ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena, atthitañ'c'eva natthitañ'ca.

meaning: does not engage (in); does not get involved (with)
example_1: yā kācimā sammutiyo puthujjā, sabbāva etā na upeti vidvā, anūpayo so upayaṃ kim'eyya, diṭṭhe sute khantim'akubbamāno.
example_2: upay'upādān'ābhinivesavinibandho khv'āyaṃ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena. tañ'c'āyaṃ upay'upādānaṃ cetaso adhiṭṭhānaṃ abhinives'ānusayaṃ na upeti na upādiyati n'ādhiṭṭhāti, attā me'ti.

meaning: does not exist; no longer exists
example_1: atthaṅ'gato so uda vā so n'atthi, udāhu ve sassatiyā arogo, taṃ me munī sādhu viyākarohi, tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo?
example_2: sabbaṃ atthī'ti kho, kaccāna, ayam'eko anto. sabbaṃ n'atthī'ti ayaṃ dutiyo anto. ete te, kaccāna, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṃ deseti

meaning: nonexistence; absence; fact of not being present
example_1: bhikkhunīnam'ovādo pana samīpe tāsaṃ n'atthitāya n'atthi.
example_2: dvayanissito khv'āyaṃ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena, atthitañ'c'eva n'atthitañ'ca. lokasamudayaṃ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato yā loke n'atthitā sā na hoti. lokanirodhaṃ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato yā loke atthitā sā na hoti.

meaning: does not make amends; does not redress; does not remedy; does not correct oneself
example_1: accayaṃ accayato na passati, accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ nappaṭikaroti, parassa kho pana accayaṃ desentassa yathādhammaṃ nappaṭiggaṇhāti

meaning: does not stand firmly; does not take a stand; does not make up one's mind; does not fixate
example_1: upay'upādān'ābhinivesavinibandho khv'āyaṃ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena. tañ'c'āyaṃ upay'upādānaṃ cetaso adhiṭṭhānaṃ abhinives'ānusayaṃ na upeti na upādiyati n'ādhiṭṭhāti, attā me'ti.

meaning: capable of striving; able to make an effort; fit for exertion
example_1: puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu app'ābādho hoti app'ātaṅko, samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā samannāgato n'ātisītāya n'āccuṇhāya majjhimāya padhānakkhamāya. ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyo samayo padhānāya.
example_2: addhānakkhamo hoti, padhānakkhamo hoti, app'ābādho hoti, asitaṃ pītaṃ khāyitaṃ sāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati, caṅkam'ādhigato samādhi ciraṭṭhitiko hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca caṅkame ānisaṃsā'ti.

example_1: addhānakkhamo hoti, padhānakkhamo hoti, app'ābādho hoti, asitaṃ pītaṃ khāyitaṃ sāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati, caṅkam'ādhigato samādhi ciraṭṭhitiko hoti.
kassa nu kho, bhante, subhāsitan'ti? sabbesaṃ vo, bhikkhave, subhāsitaṃ pariyāyena, api ca yaṃ mayā sandhāya bhāsitaṃ pārāyane metteyyapañhe
example_2: imassa khv'āhaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā saṃkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmi. saḷ'āyatananirodhaṃ no etaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā sandhāya bhāsitaṃ
example_3: kālena ca bhāsitā hoti, saccā ca bhāsitā hoti, saṇhā ca bhāsitā hoti, atthasaṃhitā ca bhāsitā hoti, mettacittena ca bhāsitā hoti.
example_4: ye te sutt'antā tathāgatabhāsitā gambhīrā gambhīr'atthā lok'uttarā suññatappaṭisaṃyuttā, tesu bhaññamānesu na sussūsissanti na sotaṃ odahissanti

example_1: tattha cakkhumā puriso majjhe ṭhito passeyya manusse gehaṃ pavisante'pi nikkhamante'pi
example_2: sabbaṃ atthī'ti kho, kaccāna, ayam'eko anto. sabbaṃ n'atthī'ti ayaṃ dutiyo anto. ete te, kaccāna, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṃ deseti

example_1: kālena ca bhāsitā hoti, saccā ca bhāsitā hoti, saṇhā ca bhāsitā hoti, atthasaṃhitā ca bhāsitā hoti, mettacittena ca bhāsitā hoti.
yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ yathādhammaṃ nihat'ādhikaraṇaṃ punakammāya ukkoṭeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
example_2: accayaṃ accayato na passati, accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ nappaṭikaroti, parassa kho pana accayaṃ desentassa yathādhammaṃ nappaṭiggaṇhāti
example_3: tass'etaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ, anāpanno vā pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ na āpajjissati, āpanno vā pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ yathādhammaṃ paṭikarissati.

example_1: dummedhehi pasaṃsā ca, viññūhi garahā ca yā, garahāva seyyo viññūhi, yaṃ ce bālappasaṃsanā.
example_2: yā c'eva kho pana ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu yā ca bāhirā pathavīdhātu, pathavīdhātu'r'ev'esā.
example_3: lokasamudayaṃ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato yā loke natthitā sā na hoti.
example_4: kiñ'hi siyā, bhikkhave, marīcikāya sāro? evam'eva kho, bhikkhave, yā kāci saññā

meaning: mostly; almost all; more or less; generally; largely; by and large; for the most part
example_1: ye hi keci, bhikkhave, tiracchānagatā pāṇā sīhassa migarañño nadato saddaṃ suṇanti, yebhuyyena bhayaṃ saṃvegaṃ santāsaṃ āpajjanti, bilaṃ bilāsayā pavisanti, dakaṃ dakāsayā pavisanti, vanaṃ vanāsayā pavisanti, ākāsaṃ pakkhino bhajanti.
example_2: dasahi ca lokadhātūhi devatā yebhuyyena sannipatitā honti bhagavantaṃ dassanāya bhikkhusaṅghañ'ca
example_3: dvayanissito khv'āyaṃ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena, atthitañ'c'eva natthitañ'ca.

meaning: ending of the world; cessation of the world; (comm) truth of cessation
example_1: api c'āhaṃ imasmiṃ'y'eva byāmamatte kaḷebare sasaññimhi samanake lokañ'ca paññāpemi lokasamudayañ'ca lokanirodhañ'ca lokanirodhagāminiñ'ca paṭipadan'ti.
example_2: lokasamudayaṃ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato yā loke natthitā sā na hoti. lokanirodhaṃ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato yā loke atthitā sā na hoti.

meaning: source of the world; (comm) truth of arising
example_1: api c'āhaṃ, āvuso, imasmiṃ'y'eva byāmamatte kaḷebare sasaññimhi samanake lokañ'ca paññāpemi lokasamudayañ'ca lokanirodhañ'ca lokanirodhagāminiñ'ca paṭipadan'ti.
example_2: lokasamudayaṃ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato yā loke natthitā sā na hoti. lokanirodhaṃ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato yā loke atthitā sā na hoti.

example_1: kāmaṃ kho pana m'āhu paro loko, hotu nesaṃ bhavataṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ saccaṃ vacanaṃ, atha ca pan'āyaṃ bhavaṃ purisapuggalo diṭṭh'eva dhamme viññūnaṃ gārayho
example_2: tesaṃ vo, bhikkhave, evaṃsamaññānaṃ sataṃ evaṃpaṭiññānaṃ sataṃ, yā samaṇasāmīcippaṭipadā taṃ paṭipajjissāma. evaṃ no ayaṃ amhākaṃ samaññā ca saccā bhavissati paṭiññā ca bhūtā.
example_3: kālena ca bhāsitā hoti, saccā ca bhāsitā hoti, saṇhā ca bhāsitā hoti, atthasaṃhitā ca bhāsitā hoti, mettacittena ca bhāsitā hoti.
example_4: yo ca vantakasāvassa, sīlesu susamāhito. upeto damasaccena, sa ve kāsāvam'arahati.

meaning: (of speech) smooth; soft; gentle; mild; polite
example_1: kālena ca bhāsitā hoti, saccā ca bhāsitā hoti, saṇhā ca bhāsitā hoti, atthasaṃhitā ca bhāsitā hoti, mettacittena ca bhāsitā hoti.
example_2: sātiyesu anassāvī, atimāne ca no yuto, saṇho ca paṭibhānavā, na saddho na virajjati.

example_1: sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, ādittaṃ! kiñ'ca, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ ādittaṃ?
example_2: ekam'antaṃ nisinnā kho therā bhikkhū yāvatako ahosi sabbeh'eva saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo, taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
example_3: sabbehi me piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo'ti pabbajitena abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ
example_4: sabbaṃ atthī'ti kho, kaccāna, ayam'eko anto. sabbaṃ n'atthī'ti ayaṃ dutiyo anto. ete te, kaccāna, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṃ deseti

meaning: with correct understanding; with perfect wisdom
example_1: sabbaṃ rūpaṃ, n'etaṃ mama, n'eso'ham'asmi, na m'eso attā'ti evam'etaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ
example_2: lokasamudayaṃ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato yā loke natthitā sā na hoti. lokanirodhaṃ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato yā loke atthitā sā na hoti.
example_3: yo ca buddhañ'ca dhammañ'ca, saṅghañ'ca saraṇaṃ gato, cattāri ariyasaccāni, sammappaññāya passati.

meaning: is properly digested; is thoroughly digested
example_1: na khv'āhaṃ taṃ, brāhmaṇa, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya, yassa so pāyaso bhutto sammā pariṇāmaṃ gaccheyya, aññatra tathāgatassa vā tathāgatasāvakassa vā.
example_2: yaṃ ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ tejo tejogataṃ upādinnaṃ, seyyath'idaṃ, yena ca santappati yena ca jīrīyati yena ca pariḍayhati yena ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati, yaṃ vā pan'aññam'pi kiñci ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ tejo tejogataṃ upādinnaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati, rāhula, ajjhattikā tejodhātu.
example_3: addhānakkhamo hoti, padhānakkhamo hoti, app'ābādho hoti, asitaṃ pītaṃ khāyitaṃ sāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati, caṅkam'ādhigato samādhi ciraṭṭhitiko hoti.

meaning: right view; correct outlook; correct belief
example_1: yaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe ñāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhe ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sammādiṭṭhi.
example_2: ayam'eva ariyo aṭṭh'aṅgiko maggo rūpanirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyath'idaṃ sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākamm'anto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi.
example_3: ime vā pana bhonto sattā kāyasucaritena samannāgatā vacīsucaritena samannāgatā manosucaritena samannāgatā ariyānaṃ anupavādakā sammādiṭṭhikā sammādiṭṭhikammasamādānā
example_4: sammādiṭṭhi sammādiṭṭhī'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sammādiṭṭhi hotī'ti?

example_1: sahassam'api ce vācā, anatthapadasaṃhitā, ekaṃ atthapadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammati.
example_2: kālavādī bhūtavādī atthavādī dhammavādī vinayavādī nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti kālena sāpadesaṃ pariyantavatiṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ
example_3: kālena ca bhāsitā hoti, saccā ca bhāsitā hoti, saṇhā ca bhāsitā hoti, atthasaṃhitā ca bhāsitā hoti, mettacittena ca bhāsitā hoti.
example_4: yo c'āyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukh'allik'ānuyogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasaṃhito

example_1: addhānakkhamo hoti, padhānakkhamo hoti, app'ābādho hoti, asitaṃ pītaṃ khāyitaṃ sāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati, caṅkam'ādhigato samādhi ciraṭṭhitiko hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca caṅkame ānisaṃsā'ti.
bāhusaccañ'ca sippañ'ca, vinayo ca susikkhito. subhāsitā ca yā vācā, etam'maṅgalam'uttamaṃ
example_2: atha kho aparā devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca, kassa nu kho, bhagavā, subhāsitan'ti? sabbāsaṃ vo subhāsitaṃ pariyāyena, api ca mama'pi suṇātha
example_3: yathā'pi ruciraṃ pupphaṃ, vaṇṇavantaṃ agandhakaṃ, evaṃ subhāsitā vācā, aphalā hoti akubbato.
example_4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti, no dubbhāsitā, anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūnan'ti.

example_1: samphappalāpaṃ pahāya samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti kālavādī bhūtavādī atthavādī dhammavādī vinayavādī, nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā kālena sāpadesaṃ pariyantavatiṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ
example_2: bāhusaccañ'ca sippañ'ca, vinayo ca susikkhito. subhāsitā ca yā vācā, etam'maṅgalam'uttamaṃ
example_3: yathā'pi ruciraṃ pupphaṃ, vaṇṇavantaṃ agandhakaṃ, evaṃ subhāsitā vācā, aphalā hoti akubbato.
example_4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti, no dubbhāsitā, anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūnan'ti.

example_1: yo so, sāriputta, ariyasāvako tathāgate ek'antagato abhippasanno, na so tathāgate vā tathāgatasāsane vā kaṅkheyya vā vicikiccheyya vā'ti?
example_2: dukkham'eva uppajjamānaṃ uppajjati, dukkhaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ nirujjhatī'ti na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati aparapaccayā ñāṇam'ev'assa ettha hoti. ettāvatā kho, kaccāna, sammādiṭṭhi hoti.
